text: Not seeing as much Flux discussion here lately, are people discussing Flux elsewhere?

elements.text: Not seeing as much Flux discussion here lately, are people discussing Flux elsewhere?

text: It’s not Flux-exclusive, but I think there’s some activity in the machine-learning and ml-ecosystem-coordination channels on Zulip

elements.text: It’s not Flux-exclusive, but I think there’s some activity in the machine-learning and ml-ecosystem-coordination channels on Zulip
Is Zulip the new Slack?

text: Come to think of it, it seems like traffic here is down in several channels.

elements.text: Come to think of it, it seems like traffic here is down in several channels.

text: Just setup an zulip account. I dont' see a machine-learning stream over there.

elements.text: Just setup an zulip account. I dont' see a machine-learning stream over there.

text: Oh, did a search on 'zulip' here on slack and it would seem there are lot so channels that don't show up in the 'Streams' section of zulip. not sure how any of this works.

elements.text: Oh, did a search on 'zulip' here on slack and it would seem there are lot so channels that don't show up in the 'Streams' section of zulip. not sure how any of this works.
Ah, figured it out.

text: I dunno if it’s the _new_ slack, but it’s got some nice things about it. The interface felt a bit awkward to me until I started using the keyboard shortcuts (`n` for next topic and `j`/`k` for next/previous post

text: I guess looking at traffic over there on the <#C690QRAA3|machine-learning> stream and a few others I can't conclude that the traffic has moved over there. Probably still the holiday lull.

elements.text: I guess looking at traffic over there on the
stream and a few others I can't conclude that the traffic has moved over there. Probably still the holiday lull.

text: Most design discussion takes place on a platform with more permanence. Usually GH or Zulip.

elements.text: Most design discussion takes place on a platform with more permanence. Usually GH or Zulip.

text: This channel was boosted by a lot of help-focused threads. Not exactly sure why those tapered off, but I haven't seen one in a while despite no noticeable change in the rate of related help threads on Discourse.

root.text: Not seeing as much Flux discussion here lately, are people discussing Flux elsewhere?

elements.text: Not seeing as much Flux discussion here lately, are people discussing Flux elsewhere?

This channel was boosted by a lot of help-focused threads. Not exactly sure why those tapered off, but I haven't seen one in a while despite no noticeable change in the rate of related help threads on Discourse.
